languages.text: "Я могу рассказать тебе две версии правды — приятную и честную. Приятная — как только Теодора поняла, что попало ей в руки, то решила блюсти предельную секретность. Память всех членов команды была закрыта мыслеблоком. Честная версия — память всех важных членов команды была закрыта, от остальных просто избавились. Теодора разгерметизировала отсеки целыми блоками, вышвыривая ненужных свидетелей в пустоту. К тому же ей нужны были свободные трюмы для трофеев".

"I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."
languages.original_text: "Я могу рассказать тебе две версии правды — приятную и честную. Приятная — как только Теодора поняла, что попало ей в руки, то решила блюсти предельную секретность. Память всех членов команды была закрыта мыслеблоком. Честная версия — память всех важных членов команды была закрыта, от остальных просто избавились. Теодора разгерметизировала отсеки целыми блоками, вышвыривая ненужных свидетелей в пустоту. К тому же ей нужны были свободные трюмы для трофеев".

traits.locale_text: "I can tell you two versions of truth — the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugarcoated one is that Theodora realised what exactly she had gotten her hands on, she was determined to maintain the utmost secrecy. She mindlocked the memories of all the crew members. The honest one is that she mindlocked the most important crew members and simply got rid of the rest. Theodora depressurized compartments by entire blocks, throwing out the unnecessary witnesses into the void. She needed the free space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

The honest one is that she mindlocked the most important crew members and simply got rid of the rest. Theodora depressurized compartments by entire blocks, throwing out the unnecessary witnesses into the void. She needed the free space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

languages.text: « Je peux vous raconter deux versions de la vérité, soit en l'édulcorant soit en étant honnête. La version édulcorée, c'est que Théodora avait compris ce qu'elle avait découvert et qu'elle tenait à maintenir le secret absolu. Elle a donc verrouillé les souvenirs de tous les membres de son équipage. La version honnête, c'est qu'elle a verrouillé l'esprit des membres les plus importants de son équipage et simplement éliminé les autres. Théodora a dépressurisé les compartiments par blocs entiers pour précipiter les témoins gênants dans le vide. Elle avait besoin de place dans ses cales pour le butin, de toute façon. »
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

traits.locale_text: « Je peux vous raconter deux versions de la vérité, soit en l'édulcorant soit en étant honnête. La version édulcorée, c'est que Théodora avait compris ce qu'elle avait découvert et qu'elle tenait à maintenir le secret absolu. Elle a donc verrouillé les souvenirs de tous les membres de son équipage. La version honnête, c'est qu'elle a verrouillé l'esprit des membres les plus importants de son équipage et simplement éliminé les autres. Théodora a dépressurisé les compartiments par blocs entiers pour précipiter les témoins gênants dans l'espace. Elle avait besoin de place dans ses cales pour le butin, de toute façon. »

languages.text: «Puedo contarle dos versiones de la verdad: la agradable y la de verdad. La agradable es que cuando Theodora fue consciente de lo que había encontrado, consideró esencial mantener el secreto y por eso bloqueó los recuerdos de todos los tripulantes. La versión real, en cambio, es que se limitó a bloquearles los recuerdos a los tripulantes más importantes y a deshacerse de los demás. Theodora despresurizó bloques de compartimentos enteros, lanzando a los testigos que no le convenían de cabeza al vacío. De todos modos, necesitaba espacio en las bodegas para sus expolios».
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

traits.locale_text: «Puedo contarle dos versiones de la verdad: la maquillada y la imparcial. La maquillada es que Theodora era totalmente consciente de la situación y que quiso mantenerla en la más estricta confidencialidad. Y por eso bloqueó los recuerdos de todos los tripulantes. La imparcial, en cambio, es que se limitó a bloquearles los recuerdos a los tripulantes más importantes y a deshacerse de los demás. Theodora despresurizó compartimentos enteros y mandó a los testigos que no le convenían de cabeza al vacío. Total, si de todos modos, necesitaba espacio en las bodegas para sus expolios».

languages.text: “真相有两个版本，好听的版本和诚实的版本。好听的版本是，西奥多拉刚刚意识到自己得到的是什么东西，便决定严守秘密，对所有船员施加了心灵锁。诚实的版本是，她只对那些最重要的人员施加了心灵锁，把剩下的人全都处理掉了。她给船上整片整片的区域减压，把所有不需要的目击者全都丢到了虚空之中。毕竟，她得在船上腾出足够大的空间，才能放得下她的战利品。”
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

traits.locale_text: “真相有两个版本，好听的版本和诚实的版本。好听的版本是，西奥多拉意识到自己得到的是什么东西，于是她决定严守秘密，对所有船员施加了心灵锁。诚实的版本是，她只对那些最重要的船员施加了心灵锁，剩下的船员全被她消灭掉了。她给船上整片整片的区域减压，把那些无关紧要的目击者全都丢到了虚空之中。毕竟，她得在船上腾出足够大的空间，才能放得下她的战利品。”

languages.text: 「2種類の真実を話してやろうか。甘い砂糖菓子のような話と、真実の話をね。甘い方は、シオドーラは自分が何を手に入れたかを理解していて、秘密を厳守する決意をしたということさ。彼女は乗組員全員の記憶にマインドロックをかけた。真実の方は、彼女は最も重要な乗組員にマインドロックをかけ、残りは単に処分した。シオドーラはコンパートメントをブロックごとに減圧し、不要な証人を虚空に放り出したんだ。まあ、戦利品のために船倉の空きスペースが必要だったってこともあるしね」
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

traits.locale_text: 「2種類の真実を話してやろうか。甘い砂糖菓子のような話と、真実の話をね。甘い方は、シオドーラは自分が何を手に入れたかを理解していて、秘密を厳守する決意をしたということさ。彼女は乗組員全員の記憶にマインドロックをかけた。真実の方は、彼女は最も重要な乗組員にマインドロックをかけ、残りは単に処分した。シオドーラはコンパートメントをブロックごとに減圧し、不要な証人を虚空に放り出したんだ。まあ、戦利品のために船倉の空きスペースが必要だったってこともあるしね」

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch zwei Versionen der Wahrheit präsentieren: die beschönigte und die ehrliche. In der beschönigten Version erkannte Theodora sofort, dass das, was sie da in den Händen hielt, unbedingt geheim gehalten werden musste. Sie hat daher die Erinnerungen sämtlicher Crewmitglieder gedankengesperrt. Die ehrliche Version ist: Sie hat die wichtigen Crewmitglieder gedankengesperrt und sich der übrigen entledigt. Theodora hat in ganzen Blocks von Modulen für einen Druckabfall gesorgt und alle ungewünschten Zeugen in die Leere katapultiert. Sie hat den Platz in den Laderäumen ohnehin für ihre Beute gebraucht."
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch zwei Versionen der Wahrheit präsentieren: die beschönigte und die ehrliche. Die beschönigte ist dies: Theodora hat erkannt, was sie da in die Finger bekommen hatte, und war entschlossen, absolute Geheimhaltung zu wahren. Sie hat die Erinnerungen sämtlicher Crewmitglieder gedankengesperrt. Die ehrliche Version ist: Sie hat die wichtigsten Crewmitglieder gedankengesperrt und sich der unwichtigen schlicht entledigt. Theodora hat in ganzen Blocks von Modulen für einen Druckabfall gesorgt und die unnötigen Zeugen in die Leere geschleudert. Sie hat den Platz in den Laderäumen ohnehin für ihre Beute gebraucht."

languages.text: "Sana gerçeği allanıp pullanmış veya saf şekilde sunabilirim. Allanıp pullanmış hâlinde Theodora, avcunda ne tuttuğunu fark ettiğinde bu duruma büyük bir mahremiyetle yaklaşılması gerektiğine karar verdi ve tüm tayfaların hatıralarını zihinlerinde kilitledi. Saf hâlindeyse önemli kişilerin hatıralarını zihinlerinde kilitledi ve geri kalanlardan kurtuldu. Theodora, birim birim kompartımanların basıncını boşalttı ve istemediği tanıkların hepsini uçsuza gönderdi. Zaten ganimetleri için daha fazla alana ihtiyacı vardı."
languages.original_text: "I can give you two versions of the truth: the sugar-coated one and the honest one. The sugar-coated version is that once Theodora realised just what she had in her hands, she deemed it a matter of the utmost secrecy and mindlocked the memories of all members of her crew. The honest version is that she mindlocked the important people and disposed of the rest. Theodora depressurised compartments by entire blocks, casting any unwanted witnesses out into the void. She needed to free up space in her holds for the spoils, anyway."
